activities: Vrs VeriClaim UK (http://www.vrsvericlaim.co.uk) focuses exclusively on loss adjusting and associated claims management in the corporate, complex and commercial arenas, providing a client orientated multi-disciplinary approach to claim handling.  On occasion personal line claims can be handled, which may require some basic personal data to be captured strictly for the purposes of processing the claim. All claims handled by vrs VeriClaim UK are processed in the United Kingdom, however the data resides on servers owned by the parent company in a professional data center in the United States.
personaldata: Commercial Claim data processed in the UK but stored on servers that reside in the US
recoursemech: Vrs VeriClaim has selected the EU DPAs for any dispute resolution and will cooperate and comply with the EU DPAs to investigate all unresolved complaints, regardless of the type of data involved.
